description: React component that renders paginated search results for a music catalog, including loading/error states, result listing with cover images, titles, artists, albums, durations, and actions to add items to a playlist.

methods.name: formatDuration(sec)
methods.description: Formats a duration in seconds into 'minutes:seconds' string.

methods.name: SearchResults({ results = [], page = 1, pageSize = 10, total, loading = false, error = "", onPrev, onNext, onAddToPlaylist, })

ctags.name: SearchResults
ctags.signature: ({ results = [], page = 1, pageSize = 10, total, loading = false, error = "", onPrev, onNext, onAddToPlaylist, })
